trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event of a <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler delegate is defined for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O representante de WindowsAuthenticationEventHandler está definido para o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento de <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: You can access the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>evento o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>classe especificando uma sub-rotina chamada **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** no arquivo global. asax para seu aplicativo ASP.NET.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.

The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>constrói um <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>usando a identidade do Windows fornecida pelo IIS e o atual do objeto <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>e o transmite para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>objeto fornecido para o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento para definir o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>para um personalizado <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Se você não especificar um valor para o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>propriedade durante o **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento, o Windows a identidade fornecida pelo IIS é usada como a identidade da solicitação atual.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a autenticação anônima, o IIS usa o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>objeto é definido como a identidade retornada pelo <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: O **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** evento só é gerado quando a autenticação <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>é definido como <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>e o <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>é um módulo HTTP ativado para o aplicativo.</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>
